name: Sandbox Coloring of Pixel Art
description:
We bring you no draw just pixel coloring application. This coloring by number game relaxes kids and adults. This art app is very productive and teaches a lot. This application also helps kids to identify number and colors. Sandbox Coloring of Pixel Flags - Color by Number is a great app to get sense of achievement after finishing a pixel image. Great activity to enhance your concentration levels and coloring skills.

Sandbox Coloring of 7 Wonders - Color by Number is not restricted or made for any special age; it can be enjoyed for all ages whoever likes the challenge. This art app improves number recognition in children.

This application is designed for anyone who likes to have fun with flags and likes a little bit challenge. Pixel coloring is fun and also challenging.

Sandbox Coloring of Pixel Flags - Color by Number includes flags of
America
United Kingdom
France
Germany
Italy
Spain
Australia
Brazil
India
Argentina
Russia
Switzerland
Africa
Egypt
Turkey

The application also includes the national dresses of the aforementioned countries.

Sandbox Coloring of 7 Wonders - Color by Number also include 7 wonders of the world. This section of the application is little bit difficult as the number of the colors increases.

You can also upload an image from your gallery and color it by numbers. And turn you pictures into pixel art.

If you leave an image in between filling the colors; it saves it’s state so that you can resume later on with your unfinished image.

How to sandbox color:
- Open the application
- Select a category
- Select an image
- Zoom the pixelated black and white image to reveal the numbers
- Select a color by number from the bottom of the pan
- Start filling the image boxes having the same number as already picked color from the pan
- Be precise and finish the image with appropriate colors

Enjoy coloring by number as it is free and very relaxing. Download now and color amazing pictures.
